ygData.msgSnippet: Hi John, I see what you re getting at but my instinct would be that this is  too many inputs to be handled by a direct encoding or back-prop with a single

Hi John,

I see what you're getting at but my instinct would be that this is  too 
many inputs to be handled by a direct encoding or back-prop with a 
single network, regardless of how many outputs there are. I don't know 
much about image processing/recognition but I think you would need at 
least one level of pre-processing of the raw data to convert it into a 
more compact form that would be applicable for input into the 
classification test.

Colin
